short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the PDSls page corresponding to an ATProto compatible website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activate from a context menu, clicking the extension icon, or a keybinding.

Supports: Bluesky, White Wind, AT Browser, Smoke Signal, and more.
If all supported patterns fail, the extension attempts to load the link as a PDS.

Configure settings in chrome://extensions

PDSls: https://pdsls.dev/
